rules_text:
Deception {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Plaskett Trickster enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard with mana value 2 or less. You may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.
